ovdesc.p: This table is used for the assigning of css classes to values. It provides a mv set of criteria for determining whether a value falls within a particular value bracket. Each mv criteria has a class name attached to it. If a routine name of type launch is entered then this will override the mv criteria - the routine will determine the name of the class.The record key of EB.ATTRIBUTES will be dynamically appended to the existing lists in Attribs field of the Version and Field Display type of Enquiry.

desc.p: A valid infobasic rouine can be attached in this field where the behavior of the field can be defined.
Must have an entry in PGM.FILE
The behavior of the class can be changed accordingly with the help of the value defined in this field.
This can be any Alpha Numeric Character.
This field can have the name of a class which is defined in CUSTOM.CSS (Custom Style sheets which is in path ..webapps/plaf)
This field holds the @ID of EB.ATTRIBUTES
It can be any alphanumeric character.
The behavior of the class can be changed accordingly with the help of operands listed below.
This field can hold any of the values - EQ_NE_RG_NR_LT_LE_GT_GE_LK_UL
